title: ICE -Zsave-analysis  lint-dead-code-5.rs  impossible case reached

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-save-analysis
labels.description: Area: saving results of analyses such as inference and borrowck results to a file.

body:
### Code reduced from `./src/test/ui/lint/dead-code/lint-dead-code-5.rs` ```Rust enum Enum2 { Variant8 { _field: bool }, } impl Enum2 { fn new_variant8() -> Enum2 { Self::Variant8 { _field: true } } } fn main() {} ``` ### Meta repo @ 219380d840877de97b0e17674be7212ebc929d51 ### Error output `RUST_BACKTRACE=full build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/bin/rustc ./src/test/ui/lint/dead-code/lint-dead-code-5.rs -Zsave-analysis` ``` error: internal compiler error: src/librustc_save_analysis/lib.rs:583: impossible case reached thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', src/librustc_errors/lib.rs:907:9 ```
Backtrace

``` warning: enum is never used: `Enum2` --> ./src/test/ui/lint/dead-code/lint-dead-code-5.rs:2:6 | 2 | enum Enum2 { | ^^^^^ | = note: `#[warn(dead_code)]` on by default warning: associated function is never used: `new_variant8` --> ./src/test/ui/lint/dead-code/lint-dead-code-5.rs:8:8 | 8 | fn new_variant8() -> Enum2 { | ^^^^^^^^^^^^ error: internal compiler error: src/librustc_save_analysis/lib.rs:583: impossible case reached thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', src/librustc_errors/lib.rs:907:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f9c1fc5cd57 -
